title: CLARC v1.0 (2-click run)
description:
No need for serials and cracks to get the full version, (already done it for you).
No unnecessary registry changes. 
No boring installation of tool-bars in your browser or other unwanted things.
You can even run this torrent from an USB-Stick.
Easy Uninstall with the Windows control panel.
Choose where you want to put the files on your PC. 
These are a few things that makes a 'Easy Run' version a better version.

If everybody seeds, you will get higher downloading speeds.

DESCRIPTION:
Our hero, Clark # 37, is a simple hardworking robot repairman who lives in a dilapidated factory nuclear weapons. Once faded old supercomputer O.T.E.TS., to come into complete chaos. Accidental discovery entertainment effects on consumption of diesel scheme robots led to a shift in priorities: from this moment all the robots have focused on drinking diesel, and not at work. All except Clark. Therefore, when there is "peace" ship, trying to disarm and dismantle merry plant, Clark is Edistvennoe who can fix things. He has to save his fellow robots and, of course, his new girlfriend - a beautiful atomic bomb Clara.


Installation instructions:
1. Execute the .exe file.
2. Follow the instructions.
3. Enjoy the program.
